Package com.continuuity.loom.scheduler

Schedules threads for solving cluster layouts and planning and coordinating cluster jobs and tasks.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
Actions Class describing what ProvisionerActions are only on hardware and not on services, which actions rollback other actions, which actions retry other actions, the order ProvisionerActions should be performed in order to carry out specific ClusterActions, and action dependencies.
Actions.Dependency Represents action dependency.
ClusterCleanup Run cleanup tasks.
ClusterScheduler Schedule clusters to be provisioned.
JobScheduler Schedules a cluster job.
SchedulableTask A Gson serializable task object that will be handed off to provisioners.
Scheduler Runs the different schedulers for solving cluster layouts and planning and coordinating cluster jobs.
SolverScheduler Polls a queue which contains ClusterRequest and a cluster id, and runs the solver to determine what the cluster layout should be for the specified cluster and cluster request.
 

Enum Summary
ClusterAction Actions that can be performed on a cluster.
 

Package com.continuuity.loom.scheduler Description

Schedules threads for solving cluster layouts and planning and coordinating cluster jobs and tasks.
